statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ -5 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -4 \\ -6 \\ 2 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -4 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 13 \\ 22 \\ 19 \\ -11 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ -5 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -4 \\ -6 \\ 2 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -4 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 13 \\ 22 \\ 19 \\ -11 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
